column5: What's a person to do when cold water slows the walleye bite and your not a fan of hard water fishing. Well, if you've got a buddy with a big boat and don't mind a little rock and roll, you fish December until the're gone.Nothing compares to walleye filets over an open fire shore lunch but fresh striper and bluefish under the broiler is a pretty good stand-in.Have good winter season!!!
